item.title: B+ Tree
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about B+ Tree ChatGPT answer: What is a B+ tree and how is it different from other tree data structures? How is the B+ tree organized internally and what does it allow for efficient searching? What is the maximum number of child nodes a B+ tree can have and how does this affect performance? How does the insertion and deletion of nodes in a B+ tree affect its balance and overall structure?
